title: "Report Excercise 3: Cleaning Data from elevated CO2 Experiments"
author: "Patricia Gribi"
date: "2023-02-22"
output: html_document
---



```{r}

library(tidyverse)

soil_organic_carbon <- read_csv("C:/Users/gribi/Unibern/AGDSI/03ex_tidy_data.csv") # the data is read into R

soil_organic_carbon_summary <- soil_organic_carbon |>  
  group_by(Experiment) |> 
  summarise(across(ends_with("CO2_mean"), mean),
            log_response_ratio = log(increased_CO2_mean/ambient_CO2_mean, base= exp(1)))

soil_organic_carbon |>
  mutate(Experiment_Phase = ifelse(`Time_(years)` <= 3, "early phase", 
                            ifelse(`Time_(years)` >= 6, "mid-phase","late phase")))|> # the Experiments are converted into 3 phases
  group_by(Experiment_Phase) |> 
  summarise(across(ends_with("CO2_mean"), mean),
            log_response_ratio = log(increased_CO2_mean/ambient_CO2_mean, base= exp(1)))

knitr::kable(soil_organic_carbon_summary)

```
